trans-unit.source: The DsmlRequestDocument class enables you to build a DSML request payload, such as <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest"></xref>, <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"></xref>, or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A classe DsmlRequestDocument permite que você crie uma carga de solicitação DSML, como <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest"> </xref>, <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It contains zero or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> derived objects.
trans-unit.target: Ele contém zero ou mais <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objetos derivados.

trans-unit.source: The user may add, delete, modify, and enumerate the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> before sending to the server.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode adicionar, excluir, modificar e enumerar o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> antes de enviar ao servidor.

trans-unit.source: DsmlRequestDocument can be used with any DSML Binding classes to transport the document, such as <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DsmlRequestDocument pode ser usado com todas as classes de associação DSML ao transporte do documento, como <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DsmlRequestDocument constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor DsmlRequestDocument cria uma instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty request document.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria um documento de solicitação vazio.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O método Add adiciona um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection at which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object was added.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> coleção na qual o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: request is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: requesté uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all items from this collection.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear remove todos os itens desta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection contains the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O método Contains determina se este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> coleção contém especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto para pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object is part of the collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto faz parte da coleção; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: O método CopyTo copia todo o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> coleção para uma matriz unidimensional, começando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiados a partir de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `value` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero `value` onde a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: The Count property contains the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Count contém o número de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The DocumentProcessing property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref> that specifies how the elements of the collection are processed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DocumentProcessing contém um dos valores de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"> </xref> que especifica como os elementos da coleção são processados.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref> that specifies how the elements of the collection are processed.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"> </xref> que especifica como os elementos da coleção são processados.

trans-unit.source: value is an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: valueé um valor de enumeração inválido.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorProcessing property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"></xref> that specifies how errors are processed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ErrorProcessing contém um dos valores de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"> </xref> que especifica como os erros são processados.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"></xref> that specifies how errors are processed.

trans-unit.target: valueé um valor de enumeração inválido.

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumerator method returns an enumerator for the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEnumerator retorna um enumerador para todo o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: O método IndexOf retorna o índice com base em zero da primeira ocorrência do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.target: O valor de índice especificada <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> do objeto, se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsSynchronized contém um valor que indica se o acesso a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SyncRoot contém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> using the SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem fornecer versões sincronizadas do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>usando a propriedade SyncRoot.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>, not directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O código de sincronização deve executar operações no SyncRoot do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>, não diretamente no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que a operação correta de coleções que são derivados de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, ele mantém uma sincronização adequada com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.Insert*> method inserts the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection at the specified index.
